  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public java.lang.String addStudent​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String passwordPlain, java.lang.String fullname, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String nationality, java.lang.String dob, java.lang.String matric_number, java.lang.String matriculation_date, java.lang.String email)
      Method for Adding new student
      Parameters:
      username - Username of student
      passwordPlain - Password of student
      fullname - Full Name of student
      gender - Gender of student
      nationality - Nationiality of student
      dob - Date of birth of student
      matric_number - Matriculation number of student
      matriculation_date - Matriculation date of student
      email - Email of student. email must be a valid, registered email
      Returns:
      Returns print message if student is added successfully

    • setStudentAccess

      public java.lang.String setStudentAccess​(java.lang.String matric_number, java.lang.String startPeriod, java.lang.String endPeriod)
      Method for setting student access period
      Parameters:
      matric_number - Matriculation number of student
      startPeriod - Start period where student is able to access STARS. Consist of both time and date.
      endPeriod - End period where student will not be able to access STARS. Consist of both time and date.
      Returns:
      Returns a success/error message.

    • createCourse

      public java.lang.String createCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.String courseSchool, int AU)
      Method for creating a new course
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course Code of the new course
      courseName - Course Name of the new course
      courseSchool - School of where the course is from.
      AU - Number of Allocated Unit for the course
      Returns:
      Returns a success message.

      oldCode - Old course code of the course to change
      newCode - New course code for the course

      Method for creating new Course Index for an existing course
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code of course to create index
      indexNum - New index number for the course
      maxCap - Maximum capacity for the index number of the course
      Returns:
      Returns a success message.

      indexNum - Index number of the course

    • addNewTimeSlot

      public java.lang.String addNewTimeSlot​(java.lang.String coursecode, int indexNumber, int lessonType, int dayOfWeek, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String startTime, java.lang.String endTime)
      Method for adding new TimeSlot for a existing course
      Parameters:
      coursecode - Course code of course to add time slot
      indexNumber - Index number of the course
      lessonType - Type of lesson. e.g(LEC, TUT, LAB)
      dayOfWeek - day of week in int
      location - Location of the lesson
      startTime - Starting time of the lesson.
      endTime - Ending time of the lesson.
      Returns:
      Returns a success/error message.

    • checkIndexSlot

      public java.lang.String checkIndexSlot​(java.lang.String courseCode, int indexNumber)
      Method for checking total number of slots available for a index in a existing course
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code of course to check
      indexNumber - Index number of the course
      Returns:
      Returns the number of available slots, total slots, and waitlist.

    • printByIndex

      public java.lang.String printByIndex​(java.lang.String courseCode, int indexNumber)
      Method for printing list of registered students arranged by index
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code of the course
      indexNumber - Index number of the course/
      Returns:
      Returns all registered students who have enrolled in the index number. If no students are found, return print message of no students found.

    • printByCourse

      public java.lang.String printByCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode)
      Method for printing list of registered students arranged by courses
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code of the course
      Returns:
      Return all registered students of the course. If no students are found, return print message of no student found.

    • timeslotClashed

      private boolean timeslotClashed​(TimeSlot ts1, TimeSlot ts2)
      Method for checking if timeslot of lesson clashes with existing time slot
      Parameters:
      ts1 - time slot of the course.
      ts2 - TIme slot of the existing course.
      Returns:
      Returns true if found, else false.

    • hash

      private byte[] hash​(java.lang.String passwordStr)
      Method for hashing password
      Parameters:
      passwordStr - Password of user
      Returns:
      Return a password hashed in SHA-256
